mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MUSEUM ( MUSEUM_NAME, MUSEUM_SIDONAME, MUSEUM_OPEN, MUSEUM_CLOSE, USER_NO ) VALUES ( #{museumName}, #{museumSidoName}, #{museumOpen}, #{museumClose}, #{userNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT MUSEUM_NAME museumName, MUSEUM_SIDONAME museumSidoName, MUSEUM_OPEN museumOpen, MUSEUM_CLOSE museumClose FROM TB_MUSEUM
